1.name: Condemn
1.details:
Every 3rd basic attack of Blademaster condemns the target, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power).

When nearby large minion, monster or enemy Hero dies, a Spirit Blade will be spawned.

Blademaster can pick up a Spirit Blade to trigger Condemn on his next basic attack.

It is possible to pick up to 3 Spirit Blades, but Blademaster can only use 1 for each basic attack.

2.name: Double Slash
2.details:
Blademaster’s next basic attack within a few seconds hits the target twice.

When Blademaster kills an enemy with Double Slash, half of the mana cost and cooldowns will be refunded. >In addition, a Spirit Blade will spawn on top of that unit.

3.name: Blade Work
3.details: Blademaster summons a Spirit Blade in a target location. Within a short while, Blademaster gains increased movement speed towards nearby Spirit Blades.

4.name: Blade Surge
4.details:
Blademaster dashes to a Spirit Blade. Within a few seconds, Blademaster's next basic attack will dash to the target enemy and grant himself increased attack speed for the next 3 basic attacks.

The attack speed boost lasts for a short while or until all 3 basic attacks are used.

5.name: Blade Storm
5.details:
Blademaster dashes to a target location, drawing all the nearby Spirit Blades to him.

Each Spirit Blade will inflict Condemn as true damage to all enemies hit and greatly slow them for a very short duration.

If Blademaster is currently holding at least 1 Spirit Blade, the initial dash will consume all the Spirit Blades on him to inflict Condemn.

Blade Storm's true damage only takes Condemn's additional damage into account, not the basic attack's damage.
